Bibliographic References: PAdd, no. A 211; FA 1953, p. 129, fig. 33 (without lid).
Imagery Description: Body: (a) Two nude women, 1. with fillet in r. hand, alabastron and fillet in 1., r. bending forward with mirror in 1. hand, at a laver on which stands a small white Eros, with two white birds (ducks) on its base, (b) seated nude youth with spray, draped woman (blackNon SepcifiedwhiteNon Sepcifiedblack stripe) bending forward with wreath in 1. hand. Lid, in three sections: (i) lekanis; (ii) lebes gamikos; (iii) squat lekythos; all decorated with female heads, wearing kekryphaloi decorated with black and white dots.
